text:
My research primarily focuses
on managerial accounting
and primarily in two main areas.

The first one is about
formal control systems, which

involve the design of
performance evaluation,

performance reports, and how
employees process and respond

to the information and feedback
generated from those systems.

And the second area is about
informal control systems,

which kind of around
team dynamics,

organizational culture,
and internal labor market.

It offers unparalleled
environment to do field studies,

and we not only have
a network of alumni

who are curious and eager to
collaborate with researchers,

but also we have professors
who have extensive experience

And also, the logistics support
from HBS is just tremendous.

Like, you don't have
to worry about anything
